entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023
